div.h2: Eastpointe High School is rated “A” by the Arizona Department of Education

div.p: For nearly two decades, Eastpointe High School has worked to do more than refine an out-of-date and primitive educational model. In those years, we’ve aspired to mold and develop a competitive and productive learning environment. Guided by our mission to inspire Arizona students in a meaningful way, we have designed our unique educational programs to meet the needs of any student who is seeking a different environment, flexibility, and a personalized educational plan. Eastpointe High School engages its students in a meaningful way in order to empower their learning journey; our mentoring program and one-on-one interactions cultivate a sense of community and success that inspires our students to earn their high school diploma and to seek a productive and fulfilling life after they graduate.
